text: @aubrey_huff @TheDemocrats @realDonaldTrump Man, you are Dumb! No one blames the Liar/ Bigot/ Grifter/ Grabber in Chief 4 the Coronavirus. They blame him 4 his response to this pandemic. What part of that do you not understand??
